name: sports-assessment-backend
description: Backend for AI Sports Talent Assessment App

scripts.start: node ./scripts/start-complete.js || echo "Run 'npm run deploy-and-run' or 'flutter run' manually"
scripts.start-complete: node ./scripts/start-complete.js || echo "Run 'npm run deploy-and-run' or 'flutter run' manually"
scripts.start-with-ml: node ./scripts/start-complete.js || echo "Run 'npm run deploy-and-run' or 'flutter run' manually"
scripts.start-global: echo "Use 'npm run dev' (Convex dev) and run the app locally with 'flutter run'"
scripts.setup-ml: pip install -r requirements.txt && npm run setup
scripts.deploy-ml: echo "Use 'npm run deploy' or follow the docs in DEPLOYMENT_SUCCESS_GUIDE.md"
scripts.deploy-render: echo "Use 'npm run deploy' and follow render deployment docs"
scripts.build-prod: echo "Use 'flutter build apk' or CI build scripts; see README.md"
scripts.deploy-railway: echo "Use Railway deploy steps in DEPLOYMENT_SUCCESS_GUIDE.md"
scripts.vercel-build: echo 'Deploying static submission page - no build needed'

author: Sports Assessment Team
